entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 1:39 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
